item.title: Turn Complexity into Clarity: Introducing the New UEBA Behaviors Layer in Microsoft Sentinel
item.description: Security teams today face an overwhelming challenge: every data point is now a potential security signal, and SOCs are drowning in fragmented, high-volume logs from countless sources - firewalls, cloud platforms, identity systems, and more. Analysts spend precious time translating between schemas, manually correlating events, and piecing together timelines across disparate data sources. For custom detections, it’s no different. What if you could transform this noisy complexity into clear, actionable security intelligence? Today, we're thrilled to announce the release of the UEBA Behaviors laye...
